attributes.action: express deep concern at the brutality, corruption and illegality of despotic rulers such as the President of Equatorial Guinea.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prisoners in Equatorial Guinea (EQ) have no access to a fair justice system. They are kept in filthy conditions, under a brutal prison regime. Access to food is minimal and arbitrary. Access to water is arbitrary. Medical care is non existent. Prison sentences are of arbitrary length. 
The people of this country are ruled over arbitrarily. The government is oppressive and corrupt beyond that of Sadam Hussein's Iraq. 
Equatorial Guinea is just one example of massive basic Human Rights violations (there are no Human Rights in EQ).  
We urge our Prime Minister and our government to declare voiciferously that such despotic rule can not be allowed to continue in EQ or anywhere else in the world. We urge our government to take action with the international community against such despotism.
